Left canal wall down tympanomastoidectom.context: Operative Procedure: 1. Left canal wall down tympanomastoidectomy with ossicular chain reconstruction.

NIM facial nerve monitoring for three ho.context: 3. NIM facial nerve monitoring for three hours.

extremely large canal cholesteatoma.context: There is an extremely large canal cholesteatoma, which eroded most of the posterior and superior canal wall.

eroded most of the posterior and superio.context: There is an extremely large canal cholesteatoma, which eroded most of the posterior and superior canal wall.

myringosclerosis.context: There was a significant amount of myringosclerosis and tympanosclerosis.

tympanosclerosis.context: There was also a large focus of tympanosclerosis between the stapes crura, which was impinging the ability of the stapes to move.

mild erosion of the lenticular process o.context: There is some mild erosion of the lenticular process of the incus.

removed the incus.context: We removed the incus, removed the head of the malleus, and placed a titanium-PORP from the stapes capitulum to a cartilage graft.

removed the head of the malleus.context: We removed the incus, removed the head of the malleus, and placed a titanium-PORP from the stapes capitulum to a cartilage graft.

placed a titanium-PORP from the stapes c.context: We removed the incus, removed the head of the malleus, and placed a titanium-PORP from the stapes capitulum to a cartilage graft.

general anesthetic.context: The patient was taken to the operating room, placed under general anesthetic and intubated without difficulty.

intubated.context: The patient was taken to the operating room, placed under general anesthetic and intubated without difficulty.

NIM facial nerve monitoring.context: The NIM facial nerve monitoring electrodes were positioned and monitoring was performed throughout the procedure.

no abnormal activity.context: There was no abnormal activity during this case.

huge defect.context: We inspected the ear canal, identified the huge defect, which was completely filled with cerumen.

cerumen.context: We inspected the ear canal, identified the huge defect, which was completely filled with cerumen.

1:100,000 of epinephrine.context: Through the ear canal, we removed as much as we could and then infiltrated the canal and postauricular area with 1:100,000 of epinephrine.

postauricular incision.context: We reopened the previously used postauricular incision and dissected down the mastoid cortex.

mastoidectomy.context: We finished a complete mastoidectomy with identification of the tegmen, sigmoid sinus.

cholesteatoma.context: There was no cholesteatoma within the middle ear space, but there was roughly 40% surface area perforation.

40% surface area perforation.context: There was no cholesteatoma within the middle ear space, but there was roughly 40% surface area perforation.

calcified.context: The remaining portion of the tympanic membrane was extremely calcified and myringosclerotic; this was removed.

myringosclerotic.context: The remaining portion of the tympanic membrane was extremely calcified and myringosclerotic; this was removed.

near total perforation.context: At this point, there was a near total perforation.

previous tympanoplasty.context: He had already had a previous tympanoplasty, but even outside the areas where the graft was taken, the temporalis muscle was quite atrophied and lumpy, and I suspect this was due to his chronic disease and long history of corticosteroid usage.

chronic disease.context: He had already had a previous tympanoplasty, but even outside the areas where the graft was taken, the temporalis muscle was quite atrophied and lumpy, and I suspect this was due to his chronic disease and long history of corticosteroid usage.

corticosteroid usage.context: He had already had a previous tympanoplasty, but even outside the areas where the graft was taken, the temporalis muscle was quite atrophied and lumpy, and I suspect this was due to his chronic disease and long history of corticosteroid usage.

meatoplasty.context: We went ahead and did a meatoplasty by making a canal incision in the 6 o'clock and 12 o'clock positions.

cartilage tympanoplasty.context: This cartilage was thin and used for cartilage tympanoplasty.

Gelfoam.context: We placed some Gelfoam in the middle ear space and placed the cartilage on the top of it.

titanium-PORP.context: We did cut a titanium-PORP of the proper side and placed on top of the stapes capitulum to interface with the cartilage cap.

antibiotics.context: He will be given antibiotics and pain medicines and he will be given instructions to follow up with me in one week.

pain medicines.context: He will be given antibiotics and pain medicines and he will be given instructions to follow up with me in one week.
